cause.description:
We are on a mission to help stop the brothels of India. Borthels are also known as whorehouses or bordello's. Some girls in brothels choose to be there, yet most are forced. This is wrong and needs to stop immediately. You can visit http://www.myspace.com/freedomeverywhere OR http://www.free.cfsites.org for more information.
1. All brothels must be destroyed.
2. Young girls deserve freedom.
cause.name: Stop Brothels
